spatial_accuracy.notes: Door leading to the kitchen/dining area from the living room is missing. Window placements on the left bedroom and right bedroom are incorrect. The door swing for the right bedroom is incorrect.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing a door element leading into the kitchen/dining. Wall thickness is not entirely consistent, especially around the right bedroom and bathroom. Adjacency of the toilet and sink in the smaller bathroom are swapped in the render.

furniture_mapping.notes: Plant placement is inconsistent. The couch configuration in the living room is different. The sink and stove in the kitchen are swapped. Some shelving units are missing or changed.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The isometric camera is correct. Orthographic projection is generally accurate. Lighting quality is acceptable. Geometry is clean with no major distortions. Visual clarity and composition are good, though some elements are missing color or texture variation.

detected_errors.description: Missing door between living room and kitchen/dining area.
Window placement on the left bedroom is incorrect.
Window placement on the right bedroom is incorrect.
Door swing orientation for the right bedroom is incorrect.
Inconsistent wall thickness in various areas, particularly around the right bedroom and bathroom.
Toilet and sink positions in the smaller bathroom are swapped.
Kitchen sink and stove positions are swapped.
Couch configuration in the living room is different.
